description: The HP 15s-du1116TU comes with Intel Pentium Silver N5030 Processor (4M Cache, 1.10 GHz up to 3.10 GHz) with Intel UHD Graphics 605. This Hp 15s series laptop comes with a micro-edge display, the barely visible bezel revolutionizes your display by letting a larger screen fit into a smaller frame, that is featured 15.6 inch diagonal, HD (1366 x 768), micro-edge, BrightView, 45% NTSC, 220 nits Display.
